page.title: 18INTERVIEWS CONT..
page.content: {A. Although I said the Workshops would {not bother us I think I would knock {those down. Q. What do you think about the shopping centre? {A. The shops are okay I suppose but we {could do with a better selection as {nearly all of the shops have the same {style of shoes and clothes. Q. Do you like Ashington ? {A. I suppose Ashington is alright but {we have never known any other place so {we could not compare it with anywhere {else.In actual fact we have noticed {that this part of Ashington is much {cleaner than the centre of the town {itself.In the centre of Ashington you {could just have a pair of net curtains {at the windows about a fortnight and {they would be cream with muck instead {of being white. }
